name: Space is NOT Invading
description:
Aliens have tried many times to invade earth through space but with no success. They have had enough and they have a genius plan to invade through the pong universe. It is up to you to master the paddle controller and save earth!

Space is NOT Invading was inspired by arcade classics of the 70s and 80s but designed specifically for use with mobile devices. Three games are included including a single Pong mode, a breakout style paddle game, and the feature game Space is NOT Invading. The feature game is a hybrid paddle shooter arcade game that involves shooting back missiles with a paddle to defend the earth.

The game is absolutely free for everyone. Enjoy!

Any questions or concerns? Email us: kimun8tytech@gmail.com
